clusters.title: Vapers overtake smokers for first time in Britain
clusters.neutral_headline: Vapers overtake smokers for first time in Britain

items.title: Vapers overtake smokers for first time in Britain
items.standfirst: Some 5.4 million adults use vapes daily or occasionally compared with 4.9 million using cigarettes, figures show.
items.content: Some 5.4 million adults use vapes daily or occasionally compared with 4.9 million using cigarettes, figures show.

items.title: Selfies as William begins Brazil visit for environment prize

items.content: The prince has key environmental work planned with the Earthshot Prize and a speech at the COP30 summit - but started with a cable car trip up Sugarloaf Mountain.

items.content: A new study suggests that changes to Hektoria Glacier are unprecedented - but not all scientists agree.

clusters.title: Maldives bans smoking for younger generations
clusters.neutral_headline: Maldives bans smoking for younger generations

items.title: Maldives bans smoking for younger generations
items.standfirst: Anyone born on or after 1 January 2007 will be banned from using, buying or selling tobacco products in the archipelago.
items.content: Anyone born on or after 1 January 2007 will be banned from using, buying or selling tobacco products in the archipelago.
